AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Flycatcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] caught insects along with many others from [PAWN_possessive] tribe, an important task in the community.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chief's Tadpole
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of [PAWN_possessive] tribe's chief.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Transformed Druid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a druid who reached a great age before deciding to polymorph into a frogman and start over with his life. [PAWN_pronoun] retained much of [PAWN_possessive] wisdom.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lost Tadpole
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] swam away from the tadpole pond while no one was looking, and was forced to grow up alone among the frogs of the swamp.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Warrior Trainee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood training to become one of [PAWN_possessive] tribe's elite warriors.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Alchemist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] practiced the art of frog alchemy, transmuting ingredients into insect meat to aid his people.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Frog Keeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] tended to the tribe's army of tamed frogs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Frog Poacher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] abandoned [PAWN_possessive] tribe and survived by killing and eating the frogs of the swamp, a horrible crime in Frogman society.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tadpole Tender
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] watched the young tadpoles, keeping them safe from predators and the environment until they were able to survive on their own.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Warrior
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] protected the tribe as an elite warrior.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fly Chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] cooked insect meat into delicious meals such as fly quiche, fly cake, and fly soup.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Puppeteer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Growing up, [PAWN_nameDef] was passionate about making and playing with puppets. [PAWN_pronoun] would frequently operate puppets to entertain [PAWN_possessive] fellow children.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Frog Supremecist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] believes that frogmen are the greatest race in the universe, and superior to all others.
